# buildBlock(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a map content block that contains a single content result.

## Declaration

```swift
static func buildBlock<C>(_ content: C) -> C where C : MapContent
```

## Parameters

- **content**: The view content to add to the block.

## Return Value

Returns the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapContent] with the single element you provided.

## Map content builders

- **buildBlock()**: Creates an empty map content block that contains no statements.

items.description: Creates an empty map content block that contains no statements.
